sqls.search_cars: SELECT distinct p.[Id] ,[Manufacturer] ,[Model] ,[Price] ,[DelayPrice] ,[Year] ,[Gear] ,g.[Group] ,[Image] FROM [RentCars].[dbo].[Car] c join PriceList p on c.PriceListId = p.Id join CarGroup g on g.Id = p.CarGroupId where IsValid = 1 and IsAvailable = 1
sqls.get_orders: select StartDate, ReturnDate, ActualReturnDate, UserId, CarId, IsActive, Id from dbo.[Order] where userid = @userid
sqls.add_order: insert into [Order] ([CarId],[StartDate], [ReturnDate], [UserId], [IsActive]) select top 1 [Id],@startDate,@returnDate,@userId,@isActive FROM [RentCars].[dbo].[Car] where [IsValid] = 1 and [IsAvailable] = 1 and [PriceListId] = @priceListId order by [Mileage] select MAX(id) as orderId from [Order]
sqls.update_order: update [Order] set StartDate = @startDate, ReturnDate = @returnDate, UserId = @userId, CarId = @carId, IsActive = @isActive where Id = @id
sqls.add_user: begin if NOT EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM [User] u WHERE [I] = @id or u.Username = @username) INSERT INTO [User] ([Id] ,[FullName] ,[Username] ,[Dob] ,[Email] ,[Password] ,[Image]) VALUES (@id, @fullName, @username, @dob, @email, @password, NULL) select ROWCOUNT@@ as rows_effected end
sqls.check_username_password: select case when exists (SELECT * FROM User where [Username] = @username and [Password] = @password) then 1 else 0 end as match
